sentences.sContent: Ellis was credited with civilizing the Texas prison system.
sentences.sCn: 据信是埃利斯改良了得克萨斯州的监狱制度。

sentences.sContent: The missionaries went out to civilize other places.
sentences.sCn: 传教士们去异国他乡教化当地人民。

words.tran: 公民的；民间的；文职的；有礼貌的；根据民法的
教化；使…文明；启发（civilize的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to educate and improve a person or a society; to make sb's behaviour or manners better
